definition[0]: cut-price goods or services are cheaper than usual
example[1]: a travel operator offering cut-price deals
definition[1]: a cut-price shop sells goods at reduced prices
definition[2]: selling products or services at extremely low prices
definition[3]: costing much less than other products of the same type
example[5]: Families are snapping up cut-price holidays as travel agents slash the cost of trips to the sun.
